name: Diamonds Factory
description: Top Quality Diamonds at Factory Prices
overview:
Diamonds Factory is an online retail division backed by an established diamond manufacturer, well known for supplying to diamond traders worldwide. We have been designing and manufacturing diamond jewellery for more than three generations using the most skilled and experienced workforce.

Diamonds Factory holds a great standing in the global diamond industry and has supplies extended to various high street and chain stores. Our operations are controlled from our office located in the famous Hatton Garden, London.

All our diamond jewellery is made in our well established factories by our in-house skilled craftsmen. Our factories have the most up-to-date equipment and follow the most advanced processes to produce captivating pieces of jewellery. Using CAD (Computer Aided Design) and CAM (Computer Aided Manufacture) technology enables us to design and make beautiful, high standard pieces of jewellery.

We are dedicated to helping our customers make informed decision about the products they wish to purchase. We realize how difficult it can be to make an important purchase online without seeing a physical product. To eliminate this barrier, Diamonds Factory now has 3D Visualization for all its products. This will give you the opportunity to easily visualize your piece of jewellery in your chosen specifications before purchasing.
